channel.title: Battlefield 2142 won't connect to EA Master Server
channel.description: So yeah. I doubt that they're running maintenance or some shit like that, because I called my friend while he was playing and he connected fine. So basically when I choose my soldier then click continue, it says "Connecting to EA Master Server", but the Cancel button doesn't light up when you roll the cursor on it and the cursor doesn't change into a walker like its supposed to, so I had to get out by using the task manager and end the process. Any help, please?

item.title: Battlefield 2142 won't connect to EA Master Server
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
Today. I uninstalled then reinstalled the game, the patch too.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield 2142 won't connect to EA Master Server
item.dc:creator: Shinobi
item.description:
Yeah, Battlefield is just really buggy like that. When was the last time you installed a patch? Usually its best to reinstall the whole game when you install a new patch.

item.title: Battlefield 2142 won't connect to EA Master Server
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
I watched The Hurt Locker, went back to my pc, and it’s still there. Well, I ran it again, but it worked this time, but it’ll probably freeze up again when I run it. It’s like there’s a 90% chance it’ll freeze up.

item.title: Battlefield 2142 won't connect to EA Master Server
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
So yeah. I doubt that they’re running maintenance or some shit like that, because I called my friend while he was playing and he connected fine. So basically when I choose my soldier then click continue, it says “Connecting to EA Master Server”, but the Cancel button doesn’t light up when you roll the cursor on it and the cursor doesn’t change into a walker like its supposed to, so I had to get out by using the task manager and end the process. Any help, please?
